charts.metaDescription: Near 提供一套實時 Near 數據圖表和統計信息來跟踪 NearBlocks 的所有內容：Price、Supply、Marketcap、Transaction Fee 等。
charts.heading: Near Charts & Statistics
charts.otherHeading: 其他 Near Blockchain Charts & Statistics

nearPrice.metaTitle: Near Price 今日：信息、Chart、Stats | NearBlocks
nearPrice.metaDescription: Near Daily Price (USD) chart 顯示 Near 的美元日歷史價格。所有數據都是實時、準確的，直接從 Near blockchain 獲取。
nearPrice.heading: Near Daily Price (USD) Chart
nearPrice.description: Near Daily Price (USD) chart 顯示 Near 的美元日歷史價格。

marketCapCharts.metaDescription: Near Market Capitalization chart 顯示 Near 每日市值和價格的歷史分解。所有數據都是實時、準確的，直接從 Near blockchain 獲取。
marketCapCharts.heading: Near Market Capitalization Chart
marketCapCharts.description: Near Market Capitalization chart 顯示 Near 每日市值和價格的歷史分解。

nearSupplyCharts.metaTitle: Near Supply Chart：Circulating, Total Supply | NearBlocks
nearSupplyCharts.metaDescription: Near blockchain Supply Growth Chart 顯示每日區塊獎勵和總 Near supply 的分解。所有數據都是實時、準確的，直接從 Near blockchain 獲取。
nearSupplyCharts.heading: Near Supply Growth Chart
nearSupplyCharts.description: Near Supply Growth Chart 顯示每日和總 Near supply 的分解。

txnsCharts.metaDescription: Near transactions chart 突出顯示 Near blockchain blockchain 上的 transactions 總數，每日個人分解為 total transaction、total blocks 和 total new account seen。
txnsCharts.heading: Near Daily Transactions Chart
txnsCharts.description: Chart 突出顯示 Near blockchain 上的 transactions 總數，每日個人分解為 total blocks 和 total new account seen。

blocksCharts.metaDescription: Near blockchain Block Count Chart 顯示在 Near blockchain 上每日產生的 blocks 歷史數量。所有數據都是實時、準確的，直接從 Near blockchain 獲取。
blocksCharts.heading: Near Block Count
blocksCharts.description: Near Block Count Chart 顯示在 Near blockchain 上每日產生的 blocks 歷史數量。

addressesCharts.metaDescription: Near blockchain unique accounts chart 顯示 Near blockchain 上不同 accounts 的總數和每日 account 數量的增長。
addressesCharts.heading: Near Unique Accounts Chart
addressesCharts.description: Chart 顯示 Near blockchain 上不同 accounts 的總數和每日 account 數量的增長。

txnFeeCharts.metaTitle: Near Transaction Fee History：Transaction Fee | NearBlocks
txnFeeCharts.metaDescription: Near blockchain transaction fee chart 顯示在 Near blockchain (Ⓝ) 上每個 transaction 花費的美元日金額。所有數據都是實時、準確的，直接從 Near blockchain 獲取。
txnFeeCharts.heading: Transaction Fee Chart
txnFeeCharts.description: Chart 顯示在 Near blockchain 上每個 transaction 花費的美元日金額。

txnVolumeCharts.metaTitle: Near Transaction Volume Chart：Transaction Volume | NearBlocks
txnVolumeCharts.metaDescription: Near blockchain transaction volume chart 顯示在 Near blockchain 上每個 transaction 花費的美元日金額。
txnVolumeCharts.heading: Transaction Volume Chart
txnVolumeCharts.description: Chart 顯示在 Near blockchain 上每個 transaction 花費的美元日金額。

multichainTxns.metaDescription: Multichain Transactions chart 突出顯示 Near blockchain 上 multi chain transactions 的總數。
multichainTxns.heading: Multichain Transactions Chart
multichainTxns.description: Chart 突出顯示 Near blockchain 上 multichain transactions 的總數。
